sentences.en: A philanthropist is someone who donates to charity. So Harper was admitting that he views "the environment" as a charity case.
sentences.cn: 慈善家是一些热衷于慈善事业的人，因此，哈珀算是承认他认为“保护环境”是一项慈善事业。

sentences.en: But Lissoos is an entrepreneur, not just a philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 但利索斯是企业家，而不只是慈善家。

sentences.en: D. The man on the right is a philanthropist.
He also called Mr. B a philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 他也称B先生是位慈善家.

sentences.en: He too titled Mr. B a philanthropist.
Oct .29 - The International Red Cross was founded by Swiss philanthropist Henri Dunant.
sentences.cn: 瑞士慈善家亨利·杜福尔建立国际红十字会.

sentences.en: Sir John Marks Templeton, investment analyst and philanthropist, died on July 8 th, aged 95.
sentences.cn: 约翰·马克斯·邓普顿爵士, 投资分析家和慈善家, 逝于七月八日, 享年九十五岁.

sentences.en: The miser was puffed as a philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 那个守财奴被说成是个慈善家.

sentences.en: The orphanage received a generous donation from a wealthy philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 这家孤儿院收到一位富有的慈善家慷慨的捐款.

sentences.en: The philanthropist donated $ 1 million because he wanted to give back something to society.
sentences.cn: 那位慈善家捐赠了一百万美元,因为他想对社会有所回报.

sentences.en: The primary school building was officiated by Mr. Aw Boon Haw ( a philanthropist ) on 20 th April.
sentences.cn: 胡文虎先生于4月20日主持菩提小学校舍开幕礼.

sentences.en: The school was founded in memory of Sir Yue - Kong Pao , a renowned businessman, statesman and philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 学校为纪念著名的商人 、 政治家及慈善家包玉刚爵士而创办.

sentences.en: The smile of a philanthropist may be truthful.
sentences.cn: 慈善家的笑或许是真诚的.

sentences.en: The university was founded by a millionaire philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 这所大学的创建人是位腰缠万贯的慈善家.

words.tran_cn: 慈善家，博爱主义者；乐善好施的人

trans.tran_en: a rich person who gives a lot of money to help poor people
